description: Try our easy to follow Thai-Style Sausages & Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Sausage,Tree nut free,Plant-based,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai-Style Sausages & Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place coconut milk, vinegar, fish sauce, sugar and half the coriander sprigs in a small food processor and process until smooth sauce forms. Stir in chilli.
Bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add noodles and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Add snow peas and corn. Cook for 1 minute. Strain. Return saucepan to keep warm.

Cook vegetable sausages following packet instructions. Slice sausages and combine with noodles. Divide between shallow serving bowls. Spoon over sauce and garnish with remaining coriander sprigs. Serve.
